title: What did people do before… Toilets?
description:
Hello Smartypants!

Want to do some real science right at home? Our friends at MEL Science have you covered with their amazing monthly science kits -- and a special discount for our Smartypants. Use code SMARTY at MEL Science or just go to this link and get started doing science, every month, right at home!

Who Smarted's? Sea Camp Live is BACK for an encore presentation Oct 18 19 and 20 due to popular demand. Click here to join now!

Toilets seem like such an obvious thing to have around, but on today's episode you'll be surprised to learn how they came to exist, when they became popular, and some really wild facts about the humble toilet. The Trusty Narrator is flush with excitement to take you on this journey!

Quickest way to hear YOUR name on Who Smarted? Leave us a great 5-star review on Apple podcasts, include your first name, and you might hear yours on an upcoming episode.

For free home science activities and helpful stuff for classrooms and homeschool sign-up for our free newsletter at www.WhoSmarted.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
